Title: Warmly welcome the victorious convening of the Fourth Session of the National People's Congress
Designer: Revolutionary Committee of Guizhou Diesel Engine Factory (贵州柴油机厂革委会)
Publisher: Guizhou renmin chubanshe (贵州人民出版社)
Notes: A Peasant, worker and soldier, holding Little Red Books, stand before a huge crowd in front of the Great Hall of the People, where the National People's Congress is held. The worker also holds a 喜報 - announcement of joyful news.
